review_content: Für mich einfach ein nettes Sommerbierchen. Säuerlich zitronig, auch ohne Limettenstück. Absolut unkompliziert. Klar, ist vielleicht nicht mit einem Bier im deutschen Sinne vergleichbar, das ist aber zb ein Berliner Kindl auch nicht. Erfrischend
Śmierdzi, w smaku delikatne, wodniste i kwaśne z lekką goryczką w posmaku. Piana od razu znika. Pije się bardzo łatwo jak jakąś oranżadkę - w wyglądzie też taką przypomina.
Śmierdzi. Dość słodkie, przyjemne. Na minus trochę za mało wyrazisty smak ale ogólnie jest w porządku.
Deutlich besser bekömmlich als die Impfung. Leckeres Bier für zwischendurch!
Nie wiem czy piłem coś gorszego, DMS, woda z dodatkiem jakiegoś marnego syropu i to jeszcze w klasie marki premium
Prawie nie czuć piwa. Plus jakąś kukurydza miód. Na plus fajne nagazowanie. Nie hejtuje takich piw bo smakują jak woda a ja wodę lubię, ale woda chyba jest tańsza.

180222 Aromat słodowy z lekką nutą jabłkowym, kukurydziany
Żółte z białą pianą klarowne.
Smak zboża i słodu, goryczki brak, jest chyba bez chmielu, albo z bardzo mała ilością.
Nagazowanie duże, lekkie orzeźwiające.
Ogólnie to piwo raczej jest słabe smakuje jak chrupki kukurydziane, z delikatnym chmielem. co tu dużo mówić polecam dla ludzi którzy lubią piwa bez smakowe.

0.355 bottle from Idea.

Pours pale yellow color with medium head. Not so great taste. Sweet, watery, sour. Weak and boring. Bad one.

Aroma is sweet, corn, some malts.

Color is pale yellow with a short-lived white head with little/no lacing. Ample carbonation.

Taste has a bit of sulpher, sweet corn, with little or no hops making themselves known.  No bittering. The finish is smooth and slightly sweet, with a thin presense.

The body is thin.

Overall, a refreshing pounder that is no better than a much cheaper American-brewed adjunct lager. People paying a premium are either doing it for the image or are getting ripped off.
Memories of college.  Light gold pour, quick white head.  Nose is sweet corn and some malt.  Middle is light kilned malt, pronounced corn, hint of floral hops.  Finish is sweet.
Aroma of hops but not a lot else. Slightly bitter finish and definitely need the lime added to give it a bit extra. Average carbonation.

Dose 0,33l: Helles Gold, glasklar, grobperlig, mäßig stabiler mittelporiger Schaum; sehr leichte + dezent fruchtige Mase, ansatzweise Zitrusnoten, dezente malzige Süße, Malz, Getreide, etwas Karamell, kaum wahrnehmbare Hopfennoten; frischer + leicht fruchtiger Körper, dezente Zitrusnoten, Limetten, Malz, Getreide, Mais, popcornartig, etwas Karamell, Polenta, dezente Hopfennoten, spritzig, deutliche Kohlensäure; leichter malziger Nachgang

I still remember the first time I had one of these (late 1980s... everyone and his sister has the stupid t-shirt... And the idea of a lime in a long neck was novel)... Most disappointing experience in beer since Coors crossed the Mississippi 5 years earlier. Apparently I never rated this. But it's Cinco de Mayo and I'm feeling nostalgic so I bought a sixer at Binny's (and another of Negra... Which was my go to when I lived in a Mexican neighborhood with a small mom and pop liquor store on the corner by the apartment I lived in for most of the 90s) Anyway, Corona still sucks, but it's drinkable. Salud!
Definitely has to be the best beer I’ve ever had. Light, subtle notes of fruits, perfect for beginners. Always my go-to beer for any parties. 5 on 5

Old rating from 2016 - 330ml bottle, left over by friends visiting. Pours yellow with a small white head. Aromas & tastes of buttered biscuit, crackers, hay, sour corn, syrup, grain & malt. Moderate body. Light sweet malt finish.

Pale golden with a white moderate head.
Aroma: Pale malt, bread, bisquit, hay. With some herbal hops.
Mouth is mostly sweet but also with a bit of fresh acidity. Light body, light carbonation.

Una birra light dal colore giallo paglierino limpido, con una schiuma abbondante e persistente. Il profumo è debolmente maltato e amarognolo. Il gusto è anonimo, nessuna caratteristica se non che è frizzantina e molta leggera da bere...il finale è secco con un pizzico di amarognolo. Si potrebbe definire ideale da bere nelle calde giornate estive, ma in sostanza non è niente di che...poco più che acqua.
.. Beer. Light and standard. Remarkably more expensive than other average beers. Can't say it tastes bad though. One of the most beautiful bottles on the market

330 ml bottle, perhaps from a supermarket. Slightly opaque gold with a dirty white head; aroma is medium to heavy skunk, dirty hops; taste is light to medium skunk, straw, hop extract and some cardboard.

Color dorado claro, espuma alta y de corta duración. En su aroma predomina el cereal, su carbonatación es lo común en estas pale lager de alta comercialización, con un amargo leve y sin un regusto destacable.

The queen of commercial beers. Clear light yellow color, with a poor and short lasting white head. The aroma is quite light and simple, with  scents of cereals and grass, with lemon and metal in the background. The taste is not special, full of hay, cereals and vague citrus fruits (in particular lemon, even without a slice of it in the bottleneck, as usually done for this beer). There is a tendentially oxidized/metallic flavor accompanying the whole drink. The body is watery, with a high carbonation and a average alcohol presence  (for the actual ABV). In general a really mediocre product, that is simply supported by the hype gained over the years thanks to a very efficient marketing.

W aromacie czysty profil słodowy, zbożowy. Nawet przyjemny ten aromat, ale niestety bardzo mało intensywny.
Smak półwytrawny, nuty zbożowe, mineralne, ziemiste i jakaś tam ziołowość gdzieś tam się w tle czai.
Pełnia średnioniska, nagazowanie średnie, goryczka średnioniska.
Nawet niezłe jak na koncerniaka.

Biersmaak kan het beste omschreven worden aan de hand van een vergelijking tussen dit Corona biertje en een roeiboot: “both near water”. Samengevat, een laf en vooral waterig biertje. Als ie niet perse gedronken moet worden, laat dan maar staan.
Bitte. Ckear golden color, fast Fading white head. Grassy, hay, soapy aroma. Sweet, Low bitter taste. Very thin and light cereal aftertaste. Thin body, medium carbonation.

Biroholik
Corona Extra by Grupo Modelo
Biroholik is drinking a Corona Extra by Grupo Modelo at Untappd at Home

Ostatni raz piłem to piwo 15 lat temu w Stanach 😀 Wtedy to było coś:) Kupiłem nawet limonkę, żeby przybliżyć tamten klimat :)
Light beer that goes with spicy Mexican food very well. Slight salty and sweet flavor, pale color and light taste, certainly not too bad as a lighter lager beer.

APARÊNCIA
amarelo, translúcido.
espuma branca de média formação e persistência.
AROMA
biscoito, milho, pão e leve cítrico.
SABOR
segue o aroma, com dulçor moderado e baixo amargor.
SENSAÇÃO
refrescante, corpo baixo e alta carbonatação.
Dorée pale limpide, mousse blanche presque absente. Arômes : citron, caramel, alcool, moyenne acidité et amertume. Recette fade et sans intérêt.

The score here is way underrated. I've had many many beers that were way worse than this and this one has a score of one? Inaccurate. Anyway, very little flavor or aroma but nothing really bad. Slight sweetness balanced with good carbonation, okay body clean finish. Drinkable for this kind of beer. World pale lager.
Not much taste! Easy to drink on a summer day! But like drinking water really! If you don’t want a hangover drink this!
Bière reçu dans une box. C'est une vulgaire pils, vide de goût, parfait pour un chantier !

Bière bue en pression à Dubai puis retestée en bouteille à Lille ou je l'ai obtenue dans un coffret saveur bière. Bouche aux bulles vives, sur le citron et les céréales. C'est une bière totalement basique, mais pas imbuvable non plus, correcte. (M)
0,3l butelka, wodnista złota woda, piana znika od razu, posmak szybko znika, delikatna goryczka, gasi pragnienie.
Una cerveza que depende mucho del tipo de transporte que tenga, en lo general un sabor leve a amargor, y una malta poco perceptible.
Es una cerveza ligera, para refrescarte en una tarde soleada de verano o estando en la playa. Combina bien con jugo de Limón o salsa inglesa y especies.

Robe jaune, limpide, scintillante, bulleuse.
Fine mousse blanche éphémère.
Arômes: simple, malt et citron.
Saveurs: aigrelette, céréales et citron.
Texture: mince, effervescence vive, croustillante.

Hey, Rona, Corona, viruses, diseases, stds. Corona can lead to those, they have 5% alcohol, if a dirty college freshman gets her hands on it, stds can be passed around faster than Usain Bolt beating all the little white boys in the olympics. It has a bit of a different taste than a normal beer, and is a bit heavy having over 10 carbs. But, if you pop a nice lime slice in the bottle, the beer can be an easy 4 with a sweet beach vibe and a nice buzz.
A beach beer topped off with a freshly squeezed lime, crispy flavour with fruity and honey aromas
Aromat nikły, słodowy. W smaku wodniste, lekko słodowe i słodkie, nisko wysycone, piana znikoma.
Wizualnie idealnie klarowne. W aromacie resztki slodu, intensywnosc bardzo slaba. W smaku raczej wytrawne bardzo wodniste. Gdyby nie resztki cukru niedaleko byloby mu do wodu. Slabo.
Barwa żółta, klarowne, piana biała, niezbyt obfita, niezbyt trwała. W aromacie nikła słodowość. W smaku wodniste, woda z cukrem, lekki słód. Goryczka niska, wysycenie średnie, ciało wodniste. Sikacz

Bottle. Clear gold with an ok white head that is soon gone. Light aroma of grains, corn, straw, nothing and a hint of citrus fruits. Taste follows aroma so to speak. Mild with no bitterness. Strong carbonation. Refreshing. I really tried hard to avoid this beer this year but I finally succumbed when I wasn’t in a position to say no...There is a place and a time for a beer like this - just not in my universe.
Es perceptible el olor a malta, sin embargo, en sabor se queda corta, es una cerveza por debajo del promediom
Najbardziej wodniste piwo jakie piłem. Pustka totalna. Żubr przy tym piwie to rarytas.
Meget lys med hvidt groft skum. Let bitterhed og lille fylde. Fin beklagelig men lidt kedelig øl.

Corona Extra is a pale lager produced by Mexican brewery Cervecería Modelo and owned by Belgian company AB InBev. It is commonly served with a wedge of lime or lemon in the neck of the bottle to add tartness and flavour.

Bottle at a pizza shop in Südtirol, Ortisei, while waiting for some pizzas. Grainy nose wafting over yellow beer in a clear bottle. Flavor is a pretty mild malty/acidic grain bomb, lightly sweet and simple, with a decent amount of spicy hop bitterness for such a thin beer. Greatly enhanced by a lime slice, which I unfortunately do not have right now.
Bottle, from an off licence. Light gold colour + white head. Corn, skunked, pissy, rice, bit malty, pretty high carb, bit paper / cardboard. Bad, still better than Sol though.

Cît de mult nu se vorbeşte despre această bere totuşi specificul ei aduce popularitate şi gustînd alte beri cu mult mai bune uneori te întorci la Corona şi intelegi că o serveşti cel mai des anume pe ea.
Light golden.  Typical fizzy beer with not much flavor. .  I do like with a lime in the summertime.

As a stand-alone beer, no - but it is a go-to on a tropical island or at any beach on shot day - WITH a lime added. Refreshing, clean and easy drinking. You can suck one of these down as a thirst quencher, or order a bucket of them to put in the sand next to your beach chair. Bottles are better.
Nice malty flavor, not much to taste other than that. Great drinkability, clear, pours well.
This is boring. Nothing special in aroma or palate. Too many products with similar price can do much better than this one.

Sampled from 0.33 l bottle from 'drankgigant.de', best before November 2020. Clear, golden with a thin, frothy, slowly diminishing, white head. Sweetish, slightly skunky aroma of grains, corn and traces of straw. Quite sweet, minimally bitter, a little skunky taste of grains, corn and a touch of straw, followed by a short, minimally bitter, a little grassy-spicy finish with a touch of cardboard. Thin to medium body, slightly effervescent mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Well, it's drinkable, but far from good. At least it doesn't kill me.

710ml bottle. Pours a pale gold. Aroma of barley and hops with a sweet edge. Flavour of light malt and rice. Slightly sweet at first and then a little bitterness but then a watery aftertaste although not as bad as Sol, its Mexican cousin. Medium carbonation.  Not much flavour but easy to down and would make an ok summer lager. Unfortunately for me it was raining so I downed it while watching the TV and in this situation its very meh...
pale yellow color, white foamy head, aroma fruity, grainy,taste sweet slight bitterness ,easy drinking not to bad quiet nice

Limp-wristed slop. Id give it a zero but system wont let me. Basically tasteless with a slight fizz but you really do have to stick a slice of lemon in it just to get at least something out of it. Actually it should be illegal worldwide to call any liquid in a clear glass a beer. There's a reason why beer was put into dark bottles to stop the light destroying the proteins. This camel drool is just another trend that's why so many people drink it. Its the liquid equivalent of the Man Bun. You only have it because everyone else does and they're all too scared to say its crap.
35,5 cl. flaske. 4,5%. I en klar “sodavands-flaske” lys pilsner type. En rigtig sommer terrasse øl.

Drunk straight from bottle on a varm day while barbecuing.
Malty, quite watery without it being too weak. Distinct bitterness in the finish, some herbal notes. 

Surprisingly good. Perfect companion when warm (but only then...)

Bottiglia. Il gusto al naso resta attratto da orzo e metallo. L'intensità olfattiva è normale e la maniera in cui permane è corta. Il mantello birroso superiore resiste poco. La grandezza delle bollicine è medio-fine. Il liquido è di consistenza trasparente. Il colore è giallo dorato brillante. Il corpo è medio. L'amaro è poco incisivo. La forza gustativa è normale e la permanenza si prolunga in modo appena percepibile. Le sensazioni boccali finali risultano di facile beva. Il finale è semplice e dissetante. Il retrogusto è delicato. Sul palato arrivano indizi di miele, cereali e agrumi.
Det er jo Corona. Men den er ikke god uten en limebåt. Smaken i seg selv er ganske sur.
Woda lepsza. Woda nie cuchnie starym słodem i marihuaną. Okropne piwo. Odradzam.

Słomkowe. Piana spora. Biała. Mydlana. Redukuje się. 
Skunks z białej flaszki. 
Pustka i wodnistość. Goryczka prawie żadna. 
Że też take cuś opyla się sprowadzać aż z Meksyku?

Piwo klarowne o jasnosłomkowej barwie. Niewielka, biała piana o krótkiej trwałości. W aromacie heksanian etylu, aldehyd octowy oraz nieco DMS-u. Nie jest zachęcająco. Trunek niskowysycony. W smaku pusta, słodowa słodycz z rzeczonym DMSem, na finiszu niezidentyfikowany, specyficzny posmak estrowy. Wadliwy, pusty, kiepski lager.

Leicht, süffig, floral und fruchtig (Zitrusnoten). Weltweit verfügbar. Irgendwo ist ein mexikanisches Restaurant und dort bekommt man das. Kein schlechtes Zeug an richtig heißen Tagen und bei großem Durst. Ja, macht erstaunlich viel Spaß für ein Global Player Beer.
33cl bottle on 21-Mar-3020. Clear golden beer. Subtle aroma of grain and citrus. Light body and flavour. Malt with some grain and bread.
Corona Extra 4.5%. Pale golden, bitter nettle aroma, medium bodied, sweet pale malt, corn, grass, slightly bitter finish. Pilsener style lager from Mexico 🇲🇽

355 ml can at home. Pours a clear light golden with a quickly disappearing white head. The aromas is skunky with earthy hop notes, sweetish grains and corn. Light to medium body with a lively carbonation, a light sweetness and a very light bitterness. The flavor starts with sweetish grains, light citric notes, overcooked rice water followed by lots of cardboard, some metallic notes and a very light but lasting metallic bitterness. Not good but drinkable.

Aroma: 4
Appearance: 2
Taste: 5
Palate: 3
Overall: 6
Is this tempting fate or just supporting a brewer in need? In any case, it’s an ok beer for hot summer days
A quite yeasty and hoppy smell. The small white fizzy head disappears fast, the body is light yellow. A grassy, grainy and light hoppy taste. The body is light and dry with a lively carbonation.

Oko: wyjątkowo jasne, kolor intensywny, traci na słabej pianie.        
Nos: mokry karton, może minimalnie jakiś chmiel, jakby w tle była jakaś limonka, subtelna szmata.        
Usta: negatywne odczucia przeważają, kartonowa słodowość.
Pours pale yellow with a thin fizzly head. Aroma of acerbic malt. Taste has weak malty sweetness, little bit of rice. Palate has almost nothing aside from a residual malt nose hint. Not good.

0.355 bottle
C: clear pale amber
N: malt, shredded grain, hint of sweet lime juice
P: malty, liquid hard candy, light acidity, thin body, bland and watery with no aftertaste.
A soft sweetness desperately attempting covering something putrid. Like a generic air freshener trying in vain to cover the scents of the bathroom.

12 ounce Bottle at Beef O’Bradys
in Stow Ohio. Light scent of grain. Light yellow in color and clear. Taste the grain. Smooth and easy drinking. Light grain aftertaste. Nice beach beer! Cheers!
Great beverage, would recommend drinking the morning after drinking, great buzz
Tasted this beer. Drinkable to Pink Floyd, Elbow and other great bands. Remember to enjoy your beer in company with good friends.

Alright beer, its drinkable yes. Not very good but taste good cold yes. Very beer no taste, much decent yes haha yes very mediocre fancy yes
This one kinda sucks ngl
Drunk from the bottle.  Crystal clear and well carbonated.  Light to medium body.  Sweet and fruity taste with a Bitter aftertaste.
You can have any brew you want, as long as it's a Corona. Watery macro lager that you drink for the meme or because it's easy, cheap and readily available.
Bevuta in bottiglia.  Che dire.................se hai sete bevi anche questa.

From a can to a glass. Pours a clear yellow color with a big frothy creamy silky head. Aroma is light sweet grains corn or barley. Taste follows the aroma with a slight earthy hop note that was slightly off putting at first then i got used to it and the beer was fine. Slight malt nuttiness in the sip aswel. This beer is better without a lime. Great session beer or hot day beer.
Outa the can, at the beach, with lime, at the beach, the way it should be. Tastes like lager, but in its natural habitat, after an hour long snorkel, it’s perfect.
My wife bought this beer for me, because she thought it was something special. Plain awful!
Flasche. Goldener klarer Körper ohne Schaum.  Typisches Pale Lager, vielleicht etwas malziger im Aroma und Geschmack. Macht es nicht besser!
# 1699; 12/2019. Rice and slightly skunk aroma. Brilliant gold, absolutely without head. Strange bitter, skunky, rice, citrus. Very strange beer. 0,35 l bottle, market, Pilsen (CZ).
Bardzo delikatne i łagodne piwo w smaku , jeszcze bardziej niż eurolager - można się napić w upalny dzień :)

You know what it has its place. 

Drunk out of the bottle it's not a discard experience, light and refreshing, lends itself to being icy cold with a wedge of lime, or any fruit for that matter. I had mine with a few slices of pomelo and it was lovely. 

Sure it's thin and hasn't got any body but it's not trying to be something it isn't. Clean and cold with some fruit is the way it's supposed to be. A good beer to have before moving on to the bigger beers.
As far as cheap mass manufactured lager goes, I expected worse. Not too adjuncty or gassy. Little more to say.
Una cerveza muy suave, color amarillo claro, sin mucho olor, servida preferiblemente con un pedazo de limón. Un amargor bastante sutil y su sabor es ligeramente metálico.
Klar gul med hvitt skum. Aroma og Smak av malt, humle og mais. Moderat bitter, tynn og lett øl med lite smak. Smakt Mai 15
Light yellow pour. Lots of carbonation.  No aroma. Slightly sweet flavor.  True to style for what it is.

Refreshing but a bit skunky smell ok if you like that kinda stuff. Not over powering with flavor just a run of the mill Mexican style beer that’s trendy for Americans to drink at there favorite Mexican restaurant 


---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Expensive but I could drink it all day. I think some people are just way too used to craft stuff at this point and have forgotten how to enjoy something refreshing.

Acheté au Dépanneur Couche Tard près de chez moi. Il s’agit d’une blonde très transparente qui mousse très peu. Elle dégage une odeur de moufette propre à celle-ci. On y retrouve peu de saveurs et peu d’amertume. À boire avec une lime de préférence sinon on n’y retrouve pas grand chose. Sa demeure buvable quand on est mal pris.
it's a great beer. can be found all over the world(except Islamic countries). cheap and good flavour, just need some lime drops. Good time beer. easy to drink.

drink with an edge of lime flavor is awesome af.
just no lemon. lemon is awful srsly.
Wodnisty lager, pachnący kukurydzą i od zasypu i od DMSu. Dość lekki więc w upalny dzień, dobrze schłodzony powinien ujść w tłumie.

Turns out I have not tried this one... Re-Rated after corona outbreak.
Smell- weak, maybe hops maybe malt, maybe some spice.
Foam- thin, watery, some bitter-sweetness and maybe hops, some citrus in mix. Head is quite small, white color.
Appearance- unique brewery bottle cap and maybe even beer one so I will give bonus here, clear yellow, orange amber, weak carbonation.
Taste- weak bitter notes, hops, malt, citrus, quite refreshing, but apart from that nothing to really brag about, but definitely not as terrible as advertised, this is not a fancy beer, but compared to average lager it stands at the same place so score should be same.
Nie jest złe ale tez nie jest dobre. Ujdzie w tłoku. Dupy nie urywa 5/10 taka sytuacja
It's ok... nothing special. White head, not very pleasant or strong after taste. It's better with a slice of lime lemon

Not much nose, slightly malty and biscuity. Light-medium body, not much flavor, but what there is is nicely balanced. Unobtusive finish. A light beer, slightly maltier than most mass-market pilsneroids, but not much to talk about.

I wouldn't compare this to any craft beers by a long shot. Not a whole lot of character. It's purely for refreshment on a hot summers day. The drinkablity is very high, I've easily slugged these back. It's crisps, clean, abit of lemon. It's ok for what it is.
this is a good beer, after how I drink this beer I feel good, I don't feel a headache or drowsiness. This beer tastes soft and constantly carbonated
It is a mystery that such a poor beer has become so popular in the world. Light beer with slightly bitter aftertaste. No real character or body. Disappointing to drink every time.
Really nice beer on a hot day with the boys! It’s got a summer feel to it and is very easy drinking! Wouldn’t say it’s the best beer ever but it sure is a nice beer!
Toto som nečakal je to predražená voda zriedená z močom !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I've been ejoying Corona for over 30 years 12 months a year. Sure, I will try a new beer here and there and some are not bad. I still end up finishing with an Ice cold Corona with or without a lemon or lime. Always seems to hit the spot!! If only my cat would let me get to the only one left in the 12 pack. I have her on video unwilling to let me take one. It's very funny! Have to go, all this talk about a cold Corona has made me thirsty!! Cheers
Flasche 33cl. Unsäglich mit allerlei Zusatzstoffen haltbar und stabil gemachter Import aus Mexico, das ohne Zitronenschnitz kaum genießbar ist. Hätte man besser unter Lizenz in EU gebraut.

I think the Corona Extra is the most smooth and tasty beer I've ever drink. The way people serve it cold and with a slice of lime in it just a way to have fun and chill as I like to drink. But you don't have to get your Corona with lime, it's your friend to go with a party. I can say it is a price/performance beer. Cheers!

Pale insignificant yellow color, strangely alternating tastes. No foam. Sometimes it's smelly, sometimes it's neutral. Can be bad and can be okay. Last time it was a bit fruity, and malty, and it was in a perfect balance. Not an ordinary beer, it's expensive and neither my favourite type, but an acceptable, light drinking beer.

In the summer this is one of my best choice.. Is very common beer in my country and the taste is very fresh when the hit is very high.. But to be honest, without lemon inside the beer is little moderate. I feel the lemon make this beer better.. It stuck very well.. But i can't say this is a great beer overall.. I drink this beer very often because the alternative choice i have in some places is worse.. 
So overall good beer but nothing special or impressive...

Le saviez-vous : la lumière détruit les acides alphas, acides provenant du houblon et apportant les saveurs aromatiques et amerisantes. Seuls le verre de couleur foncé (et quelque soit la couleur) ou un contenant tel que la cannette peuvent protéger la palette aromatique de la bière issue de l’assemblage des houblons.
Si le verre est totalement transparent, il est plus probable qu’il s’agit d’un mexicain qui aurait pissé dans une bouteille

09.02.18
AR: Getreide, leicht Hopfen, Reis, Zitrone, Heu
AP: hellgelb, Apfelsaft, Urin
TA: Reis, Getreide, Zitrone
Light and refreshing beer for my sensitive stomach. May not be the strongest beer but really makes me feel like I can enjoy a drink again after suffering with digestive issues

A tasteless drink even with lime or lemon a little better but not much different . Pretty much for me this drink is tasteless and your better off just drinking water as this is probably worst taste than bud wiser.

Not a drink I would really have , and would not recommend it .
Heerlijk mexicaans bier met een perfecte smaakzeker met warm weer is dit biertje aan te bevelen. lekker verfrissend met een citroentje erbij.
W aromacie trochę zbóż, kukurydza. W smaku słodkie, kukurydziane. Pijalność średnia, nieco zapychające, choć wodniste. Ogólnie słabiutko

Słomkowe, bez piany, klarowne, iskrzące. Poza pianą wygląd bez zarzutu. W aromacie praktycznie same wady: zielone jabłko, ruski szampan, mokry karton. Za siedmioma górami w oddali chyba poczułem chmiel. Przez pół sekundy. Smaku brak przy 4 stopniach Celsjusza. Jak trochę postało na stole to czuć delikatną słodycz. Finisz pusty, bez wyrazu. Wysycenie wysokie, szczypiące w język. Kupione w Lidlu. Cena/jakość - TRAGEDIA.
Moderately low to no noble hop aroma. May have a light DMS aroma from Pils malt. Deep gold to light amber in color.
On attend d'une Coronna qu'elle rafraichisse et qu'elle soit très facile à boire. Ça c'est Ok par temps chaud. On n'attend pas qu'elle ait du gout. Bière de soif estivale.
Drinking Corona Familiar bottle. Aroma is almost non-existent. Taste is mild, almost a hint of bitterness. Not sweet either. Good balance. Texture is crisp.

Beer for the people that don't like beer. Absolutely no bitterness. I can drink this one only in chelada cocktail (infused with lime and salt), it's refreshing. But as a beer itself it is not interesting, not tasty, not the best thirst quencher and far not the most refreshing. Marketing does it's job.
Bottle. Pale gold in color with a two finger head. Aroma is skunk water and weak. Taste is weak and watery. Needs lime.
Bouteille 33 cl couleur blonde mousse blanche goût assez basique, c'est rafraîchissant mais pas extraordinaire
Not the best smell, but its light, and refreshing. Decent with or without the lime.
Pours clear, pale golden with a one finger, white head.  Aroma is grass and light corn.  Taste is corn syrup, moving to grass.  Finish is non-existent.

330ml bottle, brewed in Mexico at 4.5%. Yellow colour. Medium size active head, dissipating fairly soon. Almost no aroma. Medium carbonation. Almost completely tasteless. Slight corn, slight citrus, and gone in a jiffy. I can't say this is bad, per se, but it's little better than water (certainly not better for you!), and has next to nothing to recommend it. If you want an alcoholic beverage and can't find one you like, maybe this one's lack of taste will come in handy...that's all I've got.
cerveza por llamarla de alguna forma , de estilo industrial sin sabor a cereal ni lupulo

Barwa jasna, prawie słomkowa. Aromat lagerowy, słodowy; ale lekki. Dosyć przyjemny. W smaku przede wszystkim wodnistość. w posmaku lekko czuć kukurydzę, ale nie taką DMSową. To trochę ratuje to nudne piwo. Wbrew pozorom nie jest najgorzej

Not for silly hipsters with their fookin IPA. Great taste on a sunny day, goes down well with both guacamole, some popcorn or tim-tams and other chocolate. Enjoy it close to water, for example in the sea.cheers!
Goud, maar dan echt goud geel bier met voor een pilsener verrassend weinig schuim. Het bier smaakt mais zoet en heeft daarnaast een licht bittere en hartige smaak. Voor de rest niks spannends.
Drinking out of the bottle without a slice of lemon. Piss yellow appearance. Smell of malt and lemon, watery taste.

Appearance: golden pale.
Body: watery, clear, medium carbonation.
Head: white, almoste none.
Aroma: malt, some sweet fruits, corn, cereals.
Taste: watery, you can feel the carbonation, corn, some malt, cereals.
Aftertaste: almost none, weak bread, cereals, a bit sweet.

A generally easy beer. A beer that I could always drink but is best enjoyed in hot weather, with a lime. Nothing too special, but from the collection of “generic” beers you can’t go too wrong with a corona.
A smooth and easy drinking Mexican beer. Very refreshing, saying that, I'm not a big fan of this beer, but on a hot summer day, this one is a life saver!
Backlog. Slightly cloudy gold with a small white head. Very light and typical of the Mexican style.

Too many bottles over the years, would drink these for Taco Tuesdays at the Tap Room, notes are mexican piss, lemons, and corn. It helps in killing off some stomach issues with Mexican food but thats about it. Will get ya in the long run. Light body
Bardzo rozwodniony lager. W sumie niewiele więcej można tu napisać. Słąbe piwo.
Easy drinking, non-offensive beer. Very light with no real definition. Sweet and summary.
Orange color, middle foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.
1 for the beer and 1 for the lime gives it a score of 2. Not a bad lager but far from the best

Robe dorée claire et limpide, mousse éphéère, grosse carbo. Nez de grain léger, pointe herbacée, assez plat. En bouche, malt plutôt léger, pointe briochée, amertume moyenne, assez durable et pas très aromatique. Bière de soif pas ouf.

Aroma weak malt, herbal
Taste sweet malt presence hop bitterness
The popularity of beer is due to marketing and advertising

It does what it is meant to do, quensch the thirst. Nothing more than this and not much more to say than that. In a country with average summer temps of 50c it does a job it is suited to do. Cannot criticise that

Aromat: prawie pustka
Barwa: złota woda
Goryczka: bardzo mała
Piana: niska
Smak: orzeźwiająca woda
WITH A LIME, this is quite nice. I don't much prefer it without the lime and usually don't drink it that way.

Bottle. Really never had this, mainly due to how it looks in the bottle. Looks better in a glass - bright orange with a fading white head. Aroma is grainy with some lemon and spices - doesn't scream quality but nothing wrong with it. Light body, fizzy. Dry and rather empty with some paper as well as grain. A bit more bitterness than expected and there's a roughness to it. Ordinary but no car crash.
Habja kicsi,gyorsan eltűnik,íze kissé kesernyés és az alkohol dominál benne.Erősen szénsavas,de iható sör.
Smooth and easy to drink. A cold corona will quench your thirst on a hot day. Definitely not my first choice beer but it’s certainly better than no beer at all.

Most appropriately represented as "my first attempt at trying to be cultured with beer." After aging past the teenage years where the novelty wares of, you realise this is kind of a nothing beer. Add some lime for a better experience, but the beer itself is, although above average, still pretty meh.

Ambrozja o zniewalającym zapachu gotowanych warzyw i mokrego kartonu. W smaku raczy nas delikatnym słodem pilzneńskim i to w zasadzie tyle. Super wodniste, trochę ziołowe, goryczka niepowala. Solidne 1.3/10
Pale yellow with big white bubbles. Smells very glassy, with almost a little chili spice to it. Taste is nothing special, corny and light. Mouthfeel is like a thin oil. Disappointed.
Very pale yellow, dry and malt driven with a lack of any defining aroma, likely some UV spoilage
Bottle with slice of lime. Clear yellow appearance. Aroma is citrus. Flavour is sweet.

Chiarissima e acquosa, schiuma cercasi...
Sapore amarognolo, resta bevibile e rinfrescante se servita fredda. 
Il berla col limone, usanza ormai diffusa, la rende un po’ più accettabile ma solo perché copre il flebile e scadente carattere della birra.
Honestly a a bucket of cold coronas with  lemon on a hot day is amazing. As a session beer it’s fine.

Наконец-то попробовал. 
Вполне себе обычный легкий пивной напиток. По вкусу мне напомнил Miller. Легкое освежающее питье для жаркой летней погоды. Но и опять-таки, этот пивной напиток пивом назвать трудно. 
Свежий аромат лимона, ещё какое-то слабое послевкусие немного горьковатой травы - всё что могу сказать. 
В целом ничего особенного. Наверняка можно найти что-то гораздо интереснее в этой категории. 
Моя скромная оценка: 2.5 из 5.
Arpa Pirinç klasik kolay içimli bira Klasik Pirinç Birası "sol" ile aynı sayılır.Tipik Meksika Lager
Lager mexicana amarillo pálido y cristalina. Mucho gas, Escaso cuerpo, aroma nulo y gusto artificial. Mejora con lo de la rodajita de limón.
Boa cerveja. Leve e agradável. Boa para dias de calor e para beber na praia.
Bottle 0.335ml. Very light refreshing beer. Ideal for hot weather during the holidays.

Great sessional beer. Gfffbcgcgcfccchkhcvhgdfhccffggffggchchgghhghhcggvghhh

Zdecydowanie najbardziej nijakie i przereklamowane piwo jakie piłem w życiu.

Color amarillo pálido, cristalina. Medio dedo de espuma con retención baja. Aroma prácticamente inexistente. Gusto a malta dulce y con amargor ligeramente cítrico. Cuerpo acuoso. Cerveza de aspecto horrible que tienes que considerarla como una radler y añadir un trozo de lima para darle sentido, sólo de esa manera se le piede encontrar sentido a este agüita.
Me gusta acompañarla con limón, así toma un sabor agradable, siempre tomo una al lavar mi ropa en The Laundry Saloon, Bogotá.
Cerveza muy simple, sin cuerpo, sin espuma ni sabor. Gran popularidad pero nada más

Amazingly I’d never entered this, I guess assuming its ubiquity meant I already had. But prompted by going through the old notebook I checked, and I hadn’t. Well...I didn’t really like it then and I don’t now, light corny rubbish that tastes especially sweet and rancid as it warms.
スッキリ。クラフトビアと比べたら、ひたすらに薄く感じてしまう。ただ、飲み会の場などではとてもよい軽さ。度数も4.5%と低く、ほのかにホップの苦みが香る。モルトはそんなに感じられない。
Birra chiara, "leggera", bevuta ovviamente con la fetta di lime, come molti, in gioventù. Classica beverina
Piana jak w coca-coli opadająca błyskawicznie z sykiem, w zapachu niewiele, trochę kukurydzy, w smaku bezosobowo,płasko,wodniście, wygładzony do bólu koncerniak...
Not a fan of corona. Doesn’t taste that good.  If it’s the only choice in Mexico when they are out of Dos Equis or at a Mexican restaurant then a draft will have to do. It’s water and vodka

Pale lager industrial, nulo cuerpo, leve aroma a cereal, de alta carbonatación, sabor forzado a maíz, cereal. Final acuoso, imperceptible gusto alguno, únicamente para refrescar debido a su carbonatación alta
Didn't think it was as awful as the reviews suggest. Soft to medium carbs, lemony flavour with hints of toffee, the aroma is non existent but it was light and quite smooth.
Barwa złota, idealnie przezroczysta. Zapach kwaśny, kukurydza. Piwo bardzo wodniste, bezsmakowe ze śladowa pianą. Ciężko to nawet nazwać piwem.

This is an appropriately poorly reviewed beer. This drink is best to accompany seafood, or with Mexican food accompanied with lime & salt. Not a flavorful beer, has okay carbonation, with transparent coloring. Awesome marketing though!

Color naranja claro, transparente. Espuma blanca abundante aunque de escasa retención. Aroma prácticamente imperceptible, supongo que a cereal, si la agitas aumenta el aroma aunque no mejora la experiencia precisamente. Sabor a lo esperado:ligerísimo cereal y amargor, ambos con una sensación artificial. Textura acuosa. Carbonatación alta.
Cerveza rubia súper clara. De sabor refrescante a cítricos, aunque muy suave. Baja en alcohol.
A famosa Mexicana, no Brasil ela é caríssima devido ao fato de ser importada. Ela é bebível, mas nada que justifique o preço e a fama.
one of worst beers I've ever tried. Bitter taste with almost no aroma. Would definetly not recommmend. Don't understand the hype over this relatively expensive bottle of piss
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
One of the most refreshing beers you can get. Best with a lime and with the boys. Great to drink on a poolside or the beach.
Famosa por su marketing, no por su buen sabor. Donde la he probado la sirven siempre con limón y sal lo cual le quita el poco gusto que se puede sentir.
Famosa cerveza mejicana creada por un español. Bastante porqueria. Mas un refresco que una cerveza. Refrescante para el verano.
0,33 l bottle. Common beer what everybody knows who drink beer and lot of who not drink beer
La boisson est jaune claire, peu pétillante, quasi sans arômes et sans goût. Seul point positif, une quasi absence d'amertume qui fait que l'on peut la boire très facilement.

Flaska 355 ml från Systembolaget. Mycket ljus med dålig skumutveckling. Doft av malt och citrus. Maltig smak med inslag av frukt och citrus. Mycket dålig lager om man ska sitta hemma i TV soffan, Fungerar nog bättre i varmt klimat i samband med kryddstark mat.
I don't get the hype this beer receives. The beer is like water, which I guess is good for the beach, but as a standalone beer, not so much. Skunked, as usual.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.

This is a good bit below some of the boring, but drinkable american Lagers i had like MGD.

A smooth and easy drinking Mexican beer. Add a lime wedge and enjoy. Not offensive and has that typical corn adjunct flavor. Very refreshing. Cheers.
It is not a bad beer , but not a great one , it has a golden yellow color and a bitter yet sweet taste.

335 ml bottle. Low body higher saturation. T: missing barley malt, fizzy, medium bitter. Too expensive for such tasteless water in clear bottle. Full of substitutes and artificial ingredients: CO2, E405, ascorbic acid.

Wie man an den vielen Rezensionen sehen kann, ist dies ein sehr bekanntes Bier.
Die Geschichte mit der Limette im Hals kommt daher, dass früher die Desinfektion der Flaschen im heißen Mexiko noch nicht so sicher war, weshalb man den Hals mit einer Limette desinfiszierte und man diese einfach dann in den Hals schob (wäre ja schade drum).
Es ist ein leichtes Sommerbier, das nicht viel mit hoher Bierkultur, aber Party und Sonne zu tun hat.

Every summer a Corona gets its lime. With the lime it is bad but without it just awful. Very well marketed in the USA. Commercials are very enticing but this beer has absolutely no flavor. If it had to Mexican I will stick with Tecate

Very little intense aroma. Slightly malty. No foam. Golden transparent colour. Not developed flavours. Some malt, but very few. Little metallic. Good beer to kill thirst. Quite carbonated but a very fluid body.
Very light beer, great for a hot day on the beach. Perfect for outdoor events !
Cerveza popular, casi sin amargor, de cuerpo ligero y a gusto personal, resulta acuosa.
Gold color with white head.  Funky pilsner-like aroma.  Easy to drink, not too sweet or bitter.  Little harsh and funky aftertaste.

Very light and translucent into the glass, initial head subsides quickly into quite a flat beer. Mild and sweet flavour, deceptively strong, the easy drinking summer beer, perfect for outdoor events that you don’t want to spend too much on.

Bottle. Golden clear with some lacing. Extremely thin body and watery texture. Taste is a mix of soda and Carlsberg .
Great tasting easy drinking and not too pricey , ca be a great beer to drink with mates and always good for a bbq!
Bottle, 4.5%. Dusty and grainy aroma. Clear golden colour, sparkling. Unstable white head. The flavour starts off dusty and watery. Turns grainy, but not very sour. Low bitterness.

Recensisco questa che è stata, come per molti adolescenti, uno dei primi amori in ambito birraio, ovviamente accompagnata da una fetta di limone.

Allontanatomi da essa dopo aver scoperto cos’è la birra, me la ritrovo in mano dopo anni e decido di darle una chance di beccare un voto che non fosse zero.

Ecco, non ci riesco, è pure peggio di quello che pensassi.
Questa birra nonna niente di giusto.
Bottiglia trasparente (e già qui si capisce molto), colore giallo chiarissimo, schiuma quasi inesistente, grossolana, molte grosse bollicine
Aroma praticamente nullo, mi sembra di avere il naso congestionato, vagamente qualche cereale.
In bocca cereali, lievito, ferro e altre  note sgradevoli e artificiali.
Palato sempre ferruginoso.

Probabilmente una delle peggiori al mondo.
Si spiega il perché venga servita con il limone: probabilmente dà un minimo gusto ad una bevanda veramente scialba.

Süßer Geschmack.Im Abgang schmeckt es nach Mais. Mit Limetten sehr erfrischend. Ein leichtes lateinamerikanisches Bier, dass zwar auf Masse produziert, sich aber auch trotzdem mithalten kann mit kleineren Brauereien.
No taste at all, may as well drink water. Very slight sweet aftertaste which isn't great.
Pretty decent beer to have when you are really thearsty on a deserted beach

Found from bottle. Clear yellow. Lacks any significant flavor with an unappealing smell. If you are floating down a river and already buzzed on a hot summer day then it's at best less than decent but also a fine beer where you don't care if they all spill.
Piana tylko przez chwile potem znika. Słomkowe klarowne. Aromat nikły słodowy plus słodka kukurydza. Smak półsłodki słody.

Non va bene nemmeno per intingere le costine e le salsicce per una grigliata.

Not recommended. well, i dont have lemon. I bought this beer because of fast and furious, expecting something good. But really? The first taste told me there is probably corn in the beer, and yes, there is. Well, i dont like it at all.
Pours clear, overgased. Pretty empty both in aroma and taste, very close to the water.
Weak aroma of adjuncts, probably corn. Head completely disappearing. Clear golden colour. Only malts and corn in taste with some acidity which makes this beer somewhat refreshing.

The beer is yellow to golden colored with a fast dissappearing head and low carbo.

Finish is light bitter, little dry and very watery.
This beer is a bit of a plain Jane with a skunky bite, but add a lime and it turns into Beyoncé. Great dressed beer for hot summer days.

Hellgelb, klar, wenig Krone. Etwas grasig, strohig mit leichter Süße. Süffig, wässrig, ideal bei 30°C im Schatten in einer Hängematte am Meer.

15.06.2018 -- 0.33l bottle from edeka sehrer in freiburg, 1.69€. can't believe I've never rated this. from the bottle: a clear pale golden with a frothy head. aroma of sweetish malts, corn, vegetables, a bit stale. flavour of vegetables, cardboard.
Bland. The thin, frothy head just adds to the dirty dishwater feel that the beer has.

Corona Extra pours a clear pale golden color and sports a small white head with surprisingly decent lacing. The nose is primarily grainy and unclean at first and brings cannabis to mind with its light grassy hop. The adjunct is surprisingly muted in the attack, the mid-palate is mildly grassy. No brew that weighs in at a mere 4.5% ABV should be anywhere near this brash in the finish. Overall, amongst adjunct lagers that get this much hate, it's not the absolute worst of the worst.
Finally I dare to try it just for having on my list. Apart of nice slice of lime, attached to tge bottle and nuce gilden color... (I'll stay silent )

0,33 l bottle. Pours clear light yellow with medium lasting frothy white head. Aroma of corn, light malty, hay, stale. Aroma is not strong, but very very annoying. Taste is medium sweet and very light bitter. Flavor is wet cardboard and hay. Body is very light, texture thin and carbonation average. Finish is short, hard to describe annoying light bitterness. Very blend, which is OK, because aroma and flavor are terrible.

If you have to add a piece of fruit to a beer, how good could it actually be? For some reason my girlfriend likes this beer. Came home a few weeks ago and there was one in the fridge, I was gasping for a beer, I opened it, took one taste and instantly regretted it. Beer doesn't get much more bland than this!
Inițial testata pentru ca am remarcat-o in Fast and furious a ajuns sa îmi placa foarte mult. O bere aromata pe gustul meu. Recomand
No taste nor aroma. The fact that the bottle is clear makes it even worse..

Bottle at Beruit. This variety was provided with a lime. Clear golden color with a white head. Grain aroma. Grain lime flavor. Light body. Not a very good beer but I am one step closer to joining the next Fast and the Furious movie.

A light lager with crisp tasting weight on the tongue. A beer best chilled to bring out the flavor, smell and taste on the palate for if it sits to long to become warm the smell and taste ruin this one. Remember this is a light lager not heavy like stouts.
Best summer bev, having a BBQ with the boys drinking coronas! But half the people on here like some shite over priced craft beers 🤮
Bottle. Tried a few times. No aroma or taste whatsoever. Very bad. Tasteless and bland. Awful.

24 ounce can into lager glass, canned on 9/30/2017. Pours crystal clear medium golden yellow color 1 finger fairly dense and fluffy white head with good retention, that reduces to a thin cap that lingers. Nice spotty soapy lacing clings on the glass, with a fair amount of streaming carbonation retaining the cap. Good appearance. Aromas of cracker, corn, white bread, light biscuit dough, and mild herbal/grassy earthiness. A bit too lemon/pear fruity aromas, but not overwhelming. Okay aromas with pale malt/corn and mild earthy hop notes; with solid strength. Taste of cracker, corn, white bread, light biscuit dough, and mild herbal/grassy earthiness. Mild herbal, grassy, spicy bitterness on the finish. Lingering notes of cracker, corn, white bread, light biscuit dough, and mild herbal/grassy earthiness on the finish for a good bit. Nice robustness and balance of pale malt/corn and light earthy hop flavors; with great malt/bitterness balance, and zero cloying/astringent flavors after the finish. Moderately crisp/clean finishing. Perfectly clean on lager flavors, with zero yeast notes present. Light-moderate increasing dryness from lingering bitterness and carbonation. Medium-high carbonation and light-medium body; with a very smooth, moderately bready/grainy, and lightly sticky mouthfeel that is good. A bit thin, but not watery finish. Zero warming alcohol as expected of 4.5%. Overall this is a very solid pale adjunct lager. All around good robustness and balance of pale malt/corn and light earthy hop flavors; very smooth, crisp, clean, and refreshing to drink. Very flavorful for the ABV. Clean pale malt/grains and solid earthy hop balance for the style. Nice barley presence, and not overdone on adjuncts. An enjoyable and well made offering.

My number 1 everyday quaffing beer.
Always a couple in my fridge.
Widely available and reasonably priced.
goes down well on a hotter day especially if it’s really cold, with a piece of lime you can increase the citrus flavour
Almoust no aroma.Taste weet malts, light cardboard, corn, soft honey, a touch of skunk .meh.......
330ml bottle (bb 16 Sep 2017) at St Cuthbert’s Golf Club, Prestwick on 15 Apr 2017, sweet malty, grain aroma, golden with a thin bubbly white head, oaty, pale malty, creamy, sweet, moderate fizz.

Aluminium Bottle from Lakes & Dales co-operative, Seaton Delaval. Pale straw coloured with a very thin white head and little carbonation. It has a slight lemon and grassy flavour with a watery toffee and bitter-sweet finish. Poor.
Great beer for summers on the dock or trips to the beach. Paired nicely with a lime, this beer is great for quenching your thirst on a hot day.

330 ml bottle. Not impartial rate because I “love” this beer when I’m at the sea during the day in Italy and I have no choice if I want something of alcoholic. I don’t like soft drink or other alcoholics when I’m under the sun. So or water (maybe better?!?) or Corona. Straw colored. Usually with a slice of lemon or lime. It must be cold, so you can’t perceive aroma and taste (that are very poors). Watery. My (overrated) judge: 2. P.S. Next summer I will drink a Corona under the sun, despite the 2.

Bottle thanks to my brother. Clear golden, no head as I drank it straight from the bottle. Sweet malts, light cardboard, corn, soft honey, a touch of skunk and grass. Under medium sweet and light bitter. Light bodied with fizzy carbonation. Quite inoffensive boring lager.

Simple Pilsener type lager.
Bottle. Pours light yellow liquid, with very little head. Aroma is weak but actually OK - corny and hoppy, reminds of Czech pilsener.
Taste is watery, like carbonated water that has hints of hops and malts in it. Not much more to say.
A bit malty but short lasting aftertaste.
Good for thirst quenzing after a workout, otherwise quite pointless.
Słomkowe, klarowne. Piana biała, szybko znika. Ogólnie słaby lager. Z limonką w lato z butelki nawet orzeźwiajacy.
Mexické pivo kukuřičné. Jako není to žádný zázrak ale ani žádná extra hrůza.
Flesje gedeeld met familie bij de Bomkelder. Goudgeel helder bier. Aroma is moutig en citrusachtig. Smaak van een slappe pils. Het hoppige blijft even hangen in de mond.
33cl bottle purchased @ Casino. C’est le grand classique de la bière commerciale mexicaine. Pour désaltérer !
Fles gedeeld door ElienvdV. Geprobeerd met Inoven. Het is een lekkere dorstlesser voor in de zon.
Piss yellow, low head. A lot of skunk and hay straight from the bottle. Same in taste with malty sweetness, fizzy carbonation, watery body, mineral notes. Awfull.
Wypite jakis czas temu, ocena w ramach uzupelnienia profilu. Co tu napisac, cienizna

Fizzy kinda skunky and yellow with no real flavor to speak of. A beer in name only. This south of the border swill is so bad, most people have to stuff a lime down the neck of the bottle to mask the taste.

Bottle @ at Hallinghansens. Pours clear golden with a white head. Aroma of corn, extract, slight citrus, light wet paper, sugary feel. Taste is rather thin, no good malt base, no real sign of hops - tho a very light touch of citrus. Bland.
Bottle @ Solar Eclipse part 4 - The Darkest Night. Clear golden body with no head. Malt, some citrussy notes. Blah..
Réellement aucun autre intérêt que de glisser une tranche de citron pour la jouer ’Mexico’

Very pale, clear golden pour with thick white foam. The nose has cereal malts and a touch of hops. The taste is sweet corn with a mildly bitter hops finish. It’s light and refreshing, especially when cold.

Barwa jasnozłota, totalnie klarowne. Piana biała, dość obfita, robi sporo szumu przy nalewaniu, dosyć szybko opada i nic po niej nie zostaje. Aromat słodowy, z licznymi wadami. Mokra szmata, DMS, skunks... Pachnie to źle, nie zachęca, wręcz odrzuca. Smak jest jałowy, bezpłciowy, piwo jest puste, nie dzieje się tu zupełnie nic (jest tylko lekka nutka słodowa), ale nie jest przynajmniej tak wadliwy jak zapach. Ziołowa goryczka wyczuwalna, choć niewysoka. Wysycenie średnie do wysokiego. Piwo słabe, typowy przedstawiciel stylu, choć mam wrażenie, że nawet polskie koncernowe Eurolagery bywają lepsze.

Color dorado pajizo pálido. Burbujas gruesas. Carbonatacion media baja, espuma casi inexistente. Ideal para tomar desde la botella ya que no hay mucho aroma para disfrutar. Solo sirve al parecer para tomar casi congelada en verano. Poca cerveza, muy mala.
Uma lager refrescante e leve, para se tomar bem gelada e em grandes quantidades...
Bottle. No white head, no aroma, urinal colour, almost no taste. Useless beer.

Pale yellow color with a thin white head, which quickly vanishes. Light body, medium to high carbonation, no lacing. Aroma of mild malts, corn, water, yeast and grass. Taste of cardboard, grains, boiled greens, some alcohol. Watery mouthfeel. Dry to no aftertaste at all. Its drinkable and that’s all. Lime makes it slightly better.

As drafts não são do meu estilo preferido. Cerveja de amarelo bem vivo quase sem espuma e aromas quase inexistentes. Muito refrescante, baixo malte, baixa carbonatação e lúpulos suaves demais com final um pouco metálico. Preza mais pela refrescância e abundância do que pelo paladar diferenciado.

Reavaliado em fevereiro de 2017 - Montevideu Uruguai.

Aroma: Non-existent.
Appearance: Pale color, clear liquid, minimal head.
Taste: Light sourness.
Palate: Light body with thin texture and flat carbonation. Astringent finish.
Overall: To drink cold as ice with lemon. Nothing else to say.
One of best popular lagers, very refreshing, practically no aroma or bitterness but that’s the taste of Corona.
Aroma - malty, fresh straws, some dusty grains and corn, a bit of alcohol and yeasts. Taste - very mild, mostly malty, with straws and dusty grains, some cornflour, yeasts. Drinkable.

Ar: Podle lagerowo, slodowosc, lekko siara, kwiatowosc, diacetyl, dosc intensywny, soczysty. Zwykly podly lager. 
Wyg: Jasno zlote, polprzejrzyste, piany brak, soczek jablkowy nie piwo. 
Sm: Pusto, wodniscie, zbyt slodko, siara, mokry karton, szmata, podly nudny lager, niedobra lagerowa, siarowa goryczka, zbyt slodkie, zbyt wysoko wysycone. Fu.
Pos: Pustowo, slodowosc, podla siarczysta lagerowa znikoma goryczka, lekko zalega.
Lyst strågult med lavt skum. En kjedelig lager, men uten unoter verken i duft eller smak. Naturligvis veldig tynn.
No cóż, lekkie i orzeźwiające, więcej od niego wymagać nie trzeba. Dobre na rozruch :)
Clear golden colour, thin head, watery taste, high carbonation, average lager at the best, and to expensive for its quality.

Cerveza extremadamente floja. Aroma casi imperceptible, apariencia amarillo pálido y brillante con una corona de espuma blanca que dura un suspiro. Un sabor a cebada flojo y un paladar con cierto amargor que no aporta absolutamente nada.

The beer that ’non-beer lovers’ love to drink and that ’beer lovers’ love to criticise. Yes, it could be classed as ’expensive water’ but it also doesn’t have the overpowering flavour of cardboard that all too many lagers possess.
Corona Extra is the number-one selling beer in Mexico and the leading export brand from Mexico. This pilsener type beer was first brewed in 1925 by Cervecería Modelo, located in Mexico City.

Just a beer that is so familiar and not really in a bad way. Deserves a lime and definitely for a hot day on the beach but not awful at all. 
Re rated, taken up from 2.5 to 2.8. It's just a classic, with a lime. Without, yuck (<2) but who would do it without a lime.

355ml bottle. Clear pale golden, small white head that disappear quickly, weak lacing. Sweet aroma, corn, rice and grains. Watery and bland mouthfeel, medium carbonated. Sweet sugary taste, rice and corn, lacks bitterness.

Reigns king amongst Mexican brews. Refined ultra clear gold color. Straw and corn all the way in flavor and aroma. A classic for me when doctored up with Tapitio and limes.

Bottle, 33cL. Home. A golden beer with a medium white head ; average retention. Grain, herb. Light sweet, light dry bitter refreshing. Light body, thin texture, average good carbonation, dry short bitter finish. Overall, ok. Light, refreshing, very drinkable.

CAS-Se trata de una cerveza rubia tipo lager que destaca por su color dorado y su sabor suave, además de por ser común consumirla no como en la foto, sino directamente de la botella con una raja de limón en el cuello.
Su espuma es muy efímera y poco carbonatada. Es muy fácil de beber y es una de las más conocidas a nivel mundial.
GAL- Trátase dunha cervexa loira tipo lager que destaca polo súa cor dourada e o seu sabor suave, ademáis de por ser común consumila non coma na foto, senon directamente da boteia cunha raxa de limón no pescozo.
A súa espuma é moi efímera e pouco carbonatada. É moi fácil de beber e é unha das máis coñecidas a nivel mundial.

A mexican, pale pilsner with corn / rice and with white head. Aroma is malt, yeast, fresh fruit. Taste is bitter. Pearly.

355ml. Pale (urin) yellow, almost no head. Aroma is weak. At bit of citrus and light bread. Taste is waterish and not much taste. Medium carbonation. light aftertaste of soap. Understandable that this is an easy beer for newcomers in the genre. Almost like a sparkling water.

Aroma: Corn, maybe light flowers, unintensive. Appearance: No head, colour is light straw. Taste: Very watery, bit of corny sweetness, some very light honey-like note, no biterness at all. Palate: Carbonation high, finish semi-sweet. No body. ;)
A veces es mejor solamemte tomar agua. Una cerveza sin personalidad, sin cuerpo, sin sabor, sin absolutamente nada.

Bière jaune pâle, incroyablement limpide, bonne effervescence, et surmontée d’un mince col blanc qui disparaît en quelques secondes. Arômes de malt pâle, céréale sucrée, maïs, sirop de maïs… Effluves peut-être également un peu citronnés, pointe de houblon végétal… Plus je tente de déceler les arômes de cette bière, plus je trouve que ça sent sucré, gros grain sucré, sirop de maïs… Nez peu agréable, complexité et intensité très faibles… En bouche, pétillement moyen sur la langue, onctuosité tout de même intéressante, on note un certain velouté au palais. Au goût, malt pâle, céréale sucrée, sirop de maïs… mais ça fait aussi un peu sucre d’orge, réglisse rouge, petits fruits (baies, bleuet, fraise…). Aussi, saveur de houblon un peu citronné mais principalement végétal (herbe, branchage, feuillage…), peut-être également un peu poivré, finale assez sèche présentant une légère amertume. Goût tout de même assez intéressant, complexité plutôt faible mais bonne intensité en bouche. Bière correcte présentant quelques caractéristiques tout de même intéressantes pour une Pale Lager grand public…

Ice cold and with a wedge of lime or lemon, Corona Extra is refreshing. Slight bitter aftertaste. 

 ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

355 ml tall can bought at 7-Eleven in Metropolis Plaza, Sheung Shui.




Piss pale golden yellow colour; One-quarter finger head with soapy white foam which fades in 30 seconds; Poor sticky lacing with notable small carbonation; Quite pungent smell of light malt, with strong corn, rice, choking floral, sugar, lemon and smelly grass; Close to light sweet taste of light malt, with shades of corn, light floral, light sugar, very light lemon, faint bitter hops and light grass; Light body, watery palate; Mouth feel is very light maltyness in watery background. Adjunct taste is trace only. Light floral and sugar with thin lemon to round. Barely okay… Hoppiness is quite choking floral, lemon and grass in nose. Light floral, thin lemon and light grass in taste; Bitterness is very low for an abrupt, very low astringent sweet non-finish; Slightly dry after taste. Sweet and easy to mouth.



Comments: I waited until now for the canned version so I can skip the dread clear bottle. This is a typical macro Pale with little maltyness and but the adjuncts was restricted to bad aroma only. Taste is non-descript and fairly empty for mass enjoyment. Not bad if nothing else is available. Enough said.

Una de las peores cervezas de todo el planeta. La única cerveza que yo conozca que mejora en botella. En vaso pierde toda la poca espuma que tiene nada más verterla. Huele a limón y poco más. Es amarilla, color orina, muy clara y transparente. El sabor es agua con un poco de limón y alcohol. Ni para refrescar.

Oikeastaan täysin samat sanat kuin Solista: Eihän tämä mitään olutta ole. Varmaan toimii Meksikon lämmössä janojuomana, mutta ei siltikään voida puhua oluesta. Sitruuna-/limeviipale pulloon tiputettuna tuo kummasti lisää makua. Juohan tätä, samoin kuin vettä tai vichyäkin.
Pours pale yellow with a white head. Aroma is malt and corn. Tastes is water with a beer aftertaste. Nothing good to say about this beer.
Газированная водичка желтоватого цвета, почти без вкуса, аромата, послевкусия. Bottle 355 ml, ABV: 4.5%

Amazing, I hadn’t reviewed this until just now. Bought it at Family Mart on Nanjing East road in New Taipei City. To all those who say it is poor beer. This beer has a time and a place. By the fire in a cold pub?.....no. On the beach? Yes, definitely. 
 Colour is apparent. Proper golden lager.Nose is sharp and citrusy. Zingy even. Very refreshing on the tongue. Clean and crisp. Difficult to discern any really strong flavours. Maybe hints of lemon and corn. That said I can’t remember not enjoying a Corona. Corona typifies the summer for me. I don’t drink it all year round then on that few days of the year when I am strolling through Kenting in south Taiwan I can’t resist it. Perfect in the heat.
Bottle. Pours clear golden with medium head. Aroma is malts, corn. Taste is watery, a bit bitter, some malts and corn with notes of citrus.

Is it so wrong to enjoy a simple lager during the summer? I don't think so. Sure it's not interesting but it's a guilty pleasure in the summer

Vintage aged, bottled April 16, 2014. Fridged the whole time. Clear bright golden appearance in the bottle. Nose involves sweet corn and rubber gloves. Fairly sweet, not quite bitter. Light to medium bodied, lower carb, sticky, finishing with McDonald’s packet honey and water. With this much age, it takes on the oxidised flavour notes of a very pale, light bodied barleywine, which is to say it’s gross.

Bue à la bouteille, bien entendu. Ce n’est pas une grande bière mais il parait que d’autres mexicaines du même style sont excellentes. Malheureusement, on ne les trouve pas par ici. Pils au goût de limonade. Si vous voulez une citronnade, ajoutez un citron ! :-)
Pale yellow color, barely any head. Light malt aroma, light sweet, cannot feel bitter, some malt sweet in the finish. A little watery.

Watery palate, medium carbonation and soapy finish. If you´re dying of thirst in the desert, OK, but ther´s no other reason for brewing of this "beer".
